Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cermak due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cermak due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Irving Park
ShortDescription:
Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to debris on the tracks.

 Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
